title: Different Dropout Result on CPU and GPU with Manual Seed
body_html:
While verifying the correctness of my model, I noticed that dropout performs differently on CPU and GPU even with a manual seed set (the same on CPU and GPU).

Is this expected behaviour? Is there a way to make the results more deterministic?
